name: CREATIVITY
description:
CREATIVITY

"Capacity or facility to invent or create"

We are all born with the potential to be creative, but many times we hide it deep inside us, to the point where we convince ourselves that creating is something impossible for us.

That is a prison from which we must escape. And the only way to achieve that, is creating.

Creativity is something that we have to look for every day of our life.

---

PRO TIP: Press SPACE to take screenshots that will be saved in the data folder.
